<title level="1" pfs="">[Grick](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2478)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Grick](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2478)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 35, [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 120</row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -3

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 40

**Resistances**
physical 3 (double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tentacle +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 slashing

**Unbalancing Blow**   Any creature a grick critically hits is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against its attacks until the end of the grick's next turn.

**Vermicular Movement**   When a grick takes a Stride action to move half its Speed or less, that movement doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>
name: Grick

text: Grick Recall Knowledge - Aberration (Occultism): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Grick Source Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace pg. 35, Crown of the Kobold King pg. 120 Perception +12; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Aklo; (can't speak any language) Skills Acrobatics +11, Athletics +10, Stealth +10, Survival +8 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +1 Int -3 Wis +3 Cha -1 --- AC 19 Fort +10 Ref +11 Will +12 HP 40 Resistances physical 3 (double resistance vs. non-magical) Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 30 feet, climb 20 feet Melee Single Action jaws +12, Damage 1d8+6 piercing Melee Single Action tentacle +11 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d6+6 slashing Unbalancing Blow Any creature a grick critically hits is flat-footed against its attacks until the end of the grick's next turn. Vermicular Movement When a grick takes a Stride action to move half its Speed or less, that movement doesn't trigger reactions.
